cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 13th Dec 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 13th Dec 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 8 Bed Mixed Dorm Rooms consist of 8 pod-style Bunk Beds. Dorms are airconditioned and have lockers, private balcony, and ensuite bathroom

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Superior 4 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our 4-Share Superior FEMALE ONLY Ensuite Dorms feature privacy pod bunk-style beds, mini fridge, A/C, premium linen, balcony, room service, TV, USB ports, reading lights, shared ensuite, safe, and direct access to the on-site bistro, bars and pool tables.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
